TenantSecurityFeature.name: TenantSecurityFeature
TenantSecurityFeature.description: Stores org features across all tenants in Security Center.

DetailIdentifier.description: The ID of the individual detail record. This field is unique across all tenants.

IsEnabled.description: Indicates whether the feature is enabled or disabled.

MetricIdentifier.description: The ID of the type of metric counted. This field is unique within your organization.

MetricsType.description: The type of feature collected by this metric.

Name.description: The name of the feature for which data is being collected.

Tenant.description: The ID of the tenant where the feature was applied.

TenantName.description: The name of the connected tenant where the feature was enabled or disabled.
